recipes.label: Increase my understanding of the Colonel's techniques?
recipes.startdescription: I have mastered the Colonel's mysteries as far a mortal might master them. Even so, perhaps I might find something useful in this.
recipes.description: I am keen with the sharpness of understanding.

recipes.label: Increase my understanding of the Colonel's techniques
recipes.startdescription: Some lessons can only be learnt through the spilling of blood. Thus, even in death, our enemies may do us service.
recipes.description: My senses creak. My hearing is sharper. I am thing of fatal points and lethal edges, and I will grow sharper still.
